about_the_game:
Endless Mahjong is a truly endless and captivating game designed for connoisseurs of the Mahjong genre. The objective of the game is to connect identical stones together in order to clear the playing field and progress to the next level.

What makes Endless Mahjong truly unique is its ability to generate an unlimited number of levels. Whether you want to play 10, 100, or even 1000 playing fields, the game will continue to generate new levels for you to explore. This ensures that you will never run out of challenges and can continue enjoying the game for as long as you like.

Immerse yourself in the meditative gameplay as you carefully strategize and make your moves. The soothing music playing in the background adds to the relaxing ambiance, creating a tranquil environment for you to unwind and fully enjoy your Mahjong experience.

key features of the game

  • Infinite Levels: Endless Mahjong offers an unlimited number of levels, allowing players to enjoy an endless gameplay experience. No matter how many levels you complete, the game will generate new ones for you to continue the challenge.
  • Connect Identical Stones: The objective of the game is to connect identical stones together on the playing field. By matching and removing these stones, you progress through the levels.
  • Meditative Gameplay: Endless Mahjong provides a meditative gameplay experience, offering a relaxing and calming atmosphere. Players can immerse themselves in the strategic decision-making process and enjoy a tranquil gaming session.
  • Pleasant Music: The game is accompanied by pleasant and soothing music, enhancing the overall experience. The music helps create a serene environment, adding to the enjoyment and immersion of the gameplay.
  • Suitable for All Skill Levels: Whether you are new to Mahjong or a seasoned player, Endless Mahjong caters to players of all skill levels. Beginners can learn and improve their skills, while experienced players can challenge themselves with increasingly complex levels.

name: Endless mahjong

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 450 GTS 1024 MB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Endless Mahjong is an infinite game where you connect identical stones to clear the field and advance to the next level. With pleasant music and meditative gameplay, it offers a relaxing experience for Mahjong enthusiasts.
